name: ZapDigits
tagline: Your startup’s metrics, now all in one place
description: Privacy-friendly web analytics + dashboards for modern SaaS teams that value user trust.

name: Google Sans Code
tagline: The new font meticulously crafted for coders from Google
description: Google Sans Code is a new fixed-width font crafted for coders by Google and Universal Thirst. It blends geometric precision with Renaissance-inspired italics for high readability at small sizes.

name: Gemini 2.5 Deep Think
tagline: Experience gold-medal AI reasoning
description: Gemini 2.5 Deep Think is a new model for Google AI Ultra subscribers. It's a version of the model that achieved a gold-medal standard at the IMO, designed to solve complex problems with parallel "thinking time".

name: ZINQ AI
tagline: Do more with forms
description: Create incredibly engaging, conversational forms in seconds with ZINQ. AI-driven design for higher completion rates. Switch between default and classic modes effortlessly. Gather information with joy.

name: AI Jingle Maker
tagline: Create radio jingles, podcast intros and audio ads in a snap
description: Generate an AI voiceover (or record your voice / upload your own MP3 file), then pick an intro, a background, an outro, and let the AI Jingle Maker automagically generate your radio jingle, podcast intro or audio ad in the blink of an eye.

name: GAIA
tagline: Your Personal AI assistant for email, calendar, tasks & more
description: GAIA is a personal AI assistant that boosts your productivity by automating your digital life, from emails and tasks to goals, calendars, docs, and more — all handled proactively, just like a real assistant.

name: Focusdim
tagline: A simple Mac app to enhance your visual focus
description: Professional focus enhancement for macOS. Dim/ blur background apps or highlight your active window with beautiful colored borders. FocusDim helps you maintain concentration by providing subtle visual cues about what's important on your screen.

name: Megaton Mask
tagline: Remove or isolate backgrounds and objects, from any video
description: Mask is an AI-powered masking tool that cuts anything out of video without green screens. Upload your footage, select what you want to remove - people, objects, backgrounds - and get professional-quality cutouts in minutes, not hours.

name: AI Magicx
tagline: All-in-one AI workspace: content, code, design & API power
description: AI Magicx is your all-in-one creative AI Powerhouse tools—logo/image generators, chatbot builder, code writer, document editor, and more. Now with API v1.0, GPT-4, Claude 4, and Gemini 2.5 support. Built for creators, developers, marketers, and teams.

name: Recall Predict
tagline: Ungameable, community-powered AI benchmarks
description: Predict, by Recall, is the world’s first ungameable, community-led benchmark for frontier models. Join thousands of AI researchers, developers, and enthusiasts in evaluating and building a benchmark for OpenAI’s upcoming GPT-5 model.

name: TeacherOP
tagline: You dont know what you dont know lets figure it out together
description: Discover your exact knowledge gaps with AI-powered gap detection. TeacherOP creates personalized learning paths that guarantee mastery through adaptive, hands-on education. Start learning smarter today.

name: Alphie
tagline: Schedule any meeting in 1 click
description: Alphie is an intelligent scheduling assistant that lives in your Gmail. By learning your habits and preferences, Alphie instantly finds the best time for any meeting and handles all related communication — so you can finally take scheduling off your schedule.

name: Digital Time Capsule
tagline: Gift-wrap memories today—email them to the future.
description: Lock text and photos in a digital time-capsule for any date from tomorrow to 50 years out. We encrypt, store, and—on the big day—send a gorgeous animated reveal to you or the friend you choose.

name: Repohistory 2.0
tagline: GitHub repo analytics
description: Repohistory is a open-source analytics tool for tracking GitHub repository traffic history longer than 14 days with beautiful visualizations.

name: Socialmedimages
tagline: Social media images and banners
description: Discover and customize the perfect profile images and banners for your social media accounts. From Twitter Banner, Linkedin Banner to Twitter Profile Picture and Linkedin Profile Picture.

name: Focuser Extension
tagline: Stay focused online: block distractions and set your goal
description: Focuser helps you stay focused by blocking distracting websites. Need access to a blocked site? Just set a reason and a time limit. Focuser will remind you of your purpose and show a countdown, keeping you mindful and on track, not lost in endless scrolling

name: Electronic Piano – No install, just play
tagline: Fun virtual piano with built-in song learning mode
description: Play a realistic piano in your browser — no download, no signup. 100% free and works on all devices. Includes a fun, step-by-step mode to learn popular songs. Great for beginners, kids, or classroom activities.

name: WhiteLightning
tagline: LLM Distillation Tool
description: Build fast, compact AI classifiers with LLM prompts. WhiteLightning automatically generates data, trains a small model (<1MB), and deploys anywhere, including mobile, web, or embedded directly from your terminal.

name: SVG AI
tagline: The AI SVG generator that creates real vectors, not traces
description: SVG AI is the AI SVG generator that creates native SVGs. We generate actual vector graphics that scale infinitely without quality loss. Features precise text placement, anatomically correct designs, and professional-grade control.

name: LangWitch
tagline: LangWitch
description: App to create Constructed Languages
